channel.title: blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Synology + Docker + VSCode
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: My new Synology NAS supports Docker and I can connect to it with VSCode for tinkering with all my horrible projects!</body></html>

item.title: Begging for Treats
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: Ever wonder what would happen if a Kardashev Type II civilization found us cute?</body></html>

item.title: Animating Mermaid diagrams with terrible hacks
item.description: <html><head></head><body>So, I wanted to produce a GIF animation of a graph diagram changing over time. What I came up with wasn't the slickest result, but it's close enough to what I'd initially imagined.</body></html>
